# KAAOS Plugin

Knowledge and Analysis Automated Orchestrated System for executive knowledge management.

## Available Agents (7)

- `kaaos:orchestrator` - Central coordinator for multi-agent knowledge workflows with intelligent task delegation and progress tracking
- `kaaos:copilot-agent` - Real-time co-pilot suggesting related context, cross-references, and knowledge connections during work
- `kaaos:research-agent` - Deep research with multi-source synthesis, citation tracking, and evidence-based analysis
- `kaaos:synthesis-agent` - Knowledge synthesis across sources with pattern recognition and connection discovery
- `kaaos:strategic-reviewer` - Strategic review and decision analysis with stakeholder perspective integration
- `kaaos:gap-detector-agent` - Gap analysis identifying missing context, incomplete coverage, and knowledge debt
- `kaaos:maintenance-agent` - Automated knowledge maintenance including link validation, outdated content detection, and archival workflows

## Available Commands (7)

- `/kaaos:init` - Initialize KAAOS for an organization with directory structure and workflow templates
- `/kaaos:session` - Start knowledge work session with context loading and agent orchestration
- `/kaaos:research` - Execute research workflow with multi-agent synthesis and citation tracking
- `/kaaos:review` - Review and synthesize existing knowledge with gap detection and recommendations
- `/kaaos:digest` - Generate daily/weekly/monthly digests from knowledge base with stakeholder targeting
- `/kaaos:status` - Check system status including knowledge base health, active sessions, and automation metrics
- `/kaaos:automation` - Set up automation hooks for scheduled maintenance, digest generation, and workflow triggers

## Available Skills (3)

- `knowledge-management` - Zettelkasten-inspired patterns for atomic notes, bidirectional links, and emergent structure
- `session-management` - Session orchestration with context restoration, checkpoint management, and workflow state
- `operational-rhythms` - Daily/weekly/monthly operational rhythms for knowledge work including review cycles and synthesis cadences
